Arrow.name: Arrow
Arrow.description: 通常弾、特殊機能は何も無い。

Poison Arrow.name: Poison Arrow
Poison Arrow.description: 攻撃はダメージを与えない。その代わり、命中を受けた“生身の者”は難易度13の〈拷問／薬物抵抗〉判定を行な わねばならない。これに失敗した者はHPに直接2d6のダメージを受ける。この弾薬は防具に干渉しないため、防具を損耗しない。

Chainmail Armor (Body).name: Chainmail Armor (Body)
Chainmail Armor (Body).description: Armor made up of innumerable metal rings. -2 to REF, DEX, and MOVE.

Chainmail Armor (Head).name: Chainmail Armor (Head)
Chainmail Armor (Head).description: Armor made up of innumerable metal rings for your head. -2 to REF, DEX, and MOVE.

Full Plate Armor (Body).name: Full Plate Armor (Body)
Full Plate Armor (Body).description: Metal plated armor to resist the most powerful hits. -4 to REF, DEX, and MOVE.

Full Plate Armor (Head).name: Full Plate Armor (Head)
Full Plate Armor (Head).description: Metal plated armor to resist the most powerful hits to your head. -4 to REF, DEX, and MOVE.

Leather Armor (Head).name: Leather Armor (Head)
Leather Armor (Head).description: Simple Leather armor for your head. No armor penalty.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: Requires an arm and has HP that is reduced by damage.

Studded Leather Armor (Body).name: Studded Leather Armor (Body)
Studded Leather Armor (Body).description: Standard Studded Leather Armor. No armor penalty.

Studded Leather Armor (Head).name: Studded Leather Armor (Head)
Studded Leather Armor (Head).description: Standard Studded Leather Armor for your head. No armor penalty.

Sacred Herbs.name: Sacred Herbs
Sacred Herbs.description: Ingesting Sacred Herbs immediately heals HP equal to the user's BODY plus their WILL.

Vial of Poison.name: Vial of Poison
Vial of Poison.description: 2d6 damage unless Resist Torture/Drugs. Armor does not apply.

Bow.name: Bow
Bow.description: A revitalized bow, reloaded as part of an Attack Action.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: A wooden pole with a curved blade on each side. Favoured by raid parties for close engagements. Requires 2 hands to wield even by a wielder with Body 8 or higher.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: A bladed, hilted weapon. Specifically designed for cutting or thrusting. 2 ROF if wielding two longswords.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: A short bladed, hilted weapon. Specifically designed for cutting or thrusting.
